CustomField.description: What Time Entry system does this account have?
CustomField.formula: IF( OR( INCLUDES(Time_Entry__c, "Aderant CMS"), INCLUDES(Time_Entry__c, "Aderant Expert"), INCLUDES(Time_Entry__c, "Aderant Expert 7"), INCLUDES(Time_Entry__c, "Aderant Expert 8"), INCLUDES(Time_Entry__c, "Aderant Expert (Unknown)"), INCLUDES(Time_Entry__c, "Aderant (Unknown)"), INCLUDES(Time_Entry__c, "Keystone Time Manager")), "Aderant", IF( OR( INCLUDES(Time_Entry__c, "Carpe Diem"), INCLUDES(Time_Entry__c,"Tikit Carpe Diem 2014"), INCLUDES(Time_Entry__c,"Tikit Carpe Diem Classic"), INCLUDES(Time_Entry__c,"Tikit Carpe Diem Enterprise/TimeKM"), INCLUDES(Time_Entry__c, "Time KM")), "Tikit", IF( OR( INCLUDES(Time_Entry__c, "Elite 3E"), INCLUDES(Time_Entry__c, "Elite WebView 5.3+"), INCLUDES(Time_Entry__c, "Elite Webview pre-5.3"), INCLUDES(Time_Entry__c, "Elite (Unknown)"), INCLUDES(Time_Entry__c, "Pilgrim Lawsoft Time Recording")), "Elite", IF( OR( INCLUDES(Time_Entry__c, "Intapp Time"), INCLUDES(Time_Entry__c, "Time Builder"), INCLUDES(Time_Entry__c, "DTE"), INCLUDES(Time_Entry__c, "DTE Mobile"), INCLUDES(Time_Entry__c, "DTE Axiom"), INCLUDES(Time_Entry__c, "Rekoop")), "Intapp Time", IF( INCLUDES(Time_Entry__c, "Peppermint Technology"), "Peppermint Technology", IF( ISBLANK(Time_Entry__c), "Unknown", "Other"))))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: What Time Entry system does this account have?
CustomField.label: Time Entry - Simple
